text: Bloodwort or Sanguinaria canadensis is a flowering plant native to eastern North America. Bloodwort may also refer to: * Achillea millefolium or common yarrow, a flowering plant species native to the Northern Hemisphere and introduced in New Zealand and Australia * Haemodoraceae or bloodwort family, a family of flowering plants found primarily in the Southern Hemisphere * Sanguisorba or burnet, a genus of flowering plants native to temperate regions in the Northern Hemisphere ==See also== * Redroot (disambiguation)
title: Bloodwort (disambiguation)
